name: Castle in the sky: The Game
name_original: Castle in the sky: The Game
description:
3d platformer based on a Hayao MIyazaki movie "Castle in the sky"

movement:

WASD - move

Q/E - change character

SPASE - jump

SPACE while in air to glide or double jump

SHIFT - to sprint (only male character)

ALT - slow walk
